##  TaskPicker template


###### Message Payload

```js
var message = {
    "type": "template",
    "payload": {
        "template_type": "taskPickerTemplate",
        "tasks": [
            {
                "title": "Get balance",
                "icon": 'data:image/png;base64,',
                "postback": {
                    "title": "Get my leave balance",
                    "value": "leaveintent"
                }
            },
            {
                "title": "Change Password",
                "icon": 'data:image/png;base64,',
                "postback": {
                    "title": "change my password",
                    "value": "leaveintent"
                }
            },
            {
                "title": "Pay Bill",
                "icon": 'data:image/png;base64,',
                "postback": {
                    "title": "Pay the bill",
                    "value": "leaveintent"
                }
            },
            {
                "title": "Setup Balance Alert",
                "icon": 'data:image/png;base64,',
                "postback": {
                    "title": "Give alert message for balance",
                    "value": "leaveintent"
                }
            }
        ],
        "heading": "Choose Task"

    }
};
print(JSON.stringify(message));
